scripts.network: hc s clean && npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:ui" "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start:ui:watch"
scripts.start:ui: npm run build -w @lightningrodlabs/mementer && concurrently "npm run build:watch -w @lightningrodlabs/mementer" "npm run start -w mementer-app"
scripts.start:happ: echo "starting hc instance: $HC_ID" && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s -f=$ADMIN_PORT --piped generate ./apps/launcher/workdir/mementer.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a mementer$HC_ID network mdns
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack ./apps/launcher/workdir
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack ./apps/launcher/dnas/mementer
scripts.package:applet: npm run build:ui && npm run package -w we-applet
scripts.package:launcher: npm run build:happ && npm run build:ui && npm run package -w mementer-app && hc web-app pack ./apps/launcher/workdir
